Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Snezhinka.Sentinel.Girls2.v1.2.4-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-snezhinka.sentinel.girls2.v1.2.4.iso (2,518,382,592 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.2.4
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus OST in WAV format nullified, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content (OST in MP3 format + ArtBook)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.3 GB to 136/578 MB)
  • Installation takes from 5 seconds (w/o bonus content) to 4 minutes (with bonus content)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 2.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Play as Snezhinka, a fixed-term contract employee at a private military company, and hold the line against waves of hostile mechs in a 2.5D dystopian world. In order to survive against increasingly powerful enemies, youâ€™ll need to use what remains of your meager salary after taxes and other expenses are deducted to purchase cards and develop your combat capabilities.

This fast-paced shooting game can be enjoyed with a controller or a mouse and keyboard. The controls are simple: youâ€™ll only need to move, aim, shoot, and use gadgets.

In addition to a robust story mode, this game also features two challenge modesâ€”complete with online rankingsâ€”and a collection in which you can rewatch cutscenes and peruse information on the gameâ€™s characters and weapons.

Snezhinkaâ€™s older sister is a member of the elite Molten Iron Squadron. One day, Snezhinka abruptly loses contact with her sister, prompting her to join the private military company Blue Peacock Co. and head for the front lines of the war in order to bring her sister home.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous Snezhinka repack.

The post Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2, v1.2.4 + Bonus Content appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Lost.Eidolons.Veil.of.the.Witch-RUNE ISO release: rune-lost.eidolons.veil.of.the.witch.iso (4,025,843,712 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.6; Main Character Skin Set DLC is included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.7 to 2.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Use a desktop icon created by the installer to run the game
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
From the world of “Lost Eidolons” comes a tactical roguelite RPG, where death is just the beginning.

Shipwrecked and dying, you strike a deal with a mysterious witch for another chance. The price? Become her champion and vanquish her enemies.

As you awaken on a cursed island overrun by the dead, you have no memory and no way out – other than to forge ahead to fulfill the witch’s bidding.

Game Features

  • TACTICAL TURN-BASED COMBAT – Engage in challenging grid-based battles where every move and combo demands precision. Leverage elemental effects to manipulate the battlefield – electrify soaked enemies, ignite flammable terrain, and exploit every opportunity. Account for enemy armor and strike with the right weapon to break through and gain the advantage. Build devastating skill synergies, control the flow of battles, or be outmaneuvered and crushed by foes.
  • BUILD YOUR PARTY – Recruit allies and build a squad of 5 from 9 versatile characters – each blending multiple combat roles with unique skills, weapon sets, and personalities. As you level up, earn and upgrade over 200 skills to create deadly team compositions and game-winning builds. Experiment with different squads and strategies every run to find new ways of dominating the battlefield.
  • EVER-CHANGING JOURNEYS – No two runs are the same. Choose your path across a winding map full of random events, hidden rewards, and dangerous encounters. Every step along the islandâ€™s forking paths will present new possibilities that can shift your entire strategy. Plan your path carefully, but be ready to adapt, as some choices can lead to powerful rewards, while others hide unplanned encounters. Take risks, claim winnings, and adapt your strategy to survive what comes next.
  • ROGUELITE PROGRESSION – Failure isnâ€™t the end; itâ€™s part of the journey. Every death makes you stronger for the battles ahead. Spend your rewards at the base camp to permanently boost your stats. Promote characters to unlock powerful new skills. Deepen your bonds with allies to uncover their pasts and gain more tactical advantage on the field. When you’re ready, dive back into the fight and push farther than ever before.
  • WHAT LIES BEYOND – Once you complete a successful expedition, the real challenge begins. Return to the battlefield to track hidden clues and unravel the mysteries of your mysterious patron. Face off against powerful foes and confront the truth behind the islandâ€™s curse. And if youâ€™re feeling truly brave, tackle Trials Mode: a high-stakes challenge with customizable difficulty modifiers and juicy rewards to push your wits to the limit.

The post Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch – v1.0.6 + DLC appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Curiosity killed the cat… But satisfaction brought it back! – Leap and climb through a perilous labyrinth of obstacles, all to find your way back home. With each jump demanding precision and persistence, you must navigate through difficult platforming levels, testing your feline reflexes and determination. While falling can be a setback, take comfort in the fact that cats have nine lives. However, beware, cats that use up their lives may experience unintended consequences…

Game Features

  • Run, leap, & claw your way back home.
  • Rest & recover with friendly faces along the way.
  • Maneuver the dangers of the climb to uncover memories of the past.

  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation

  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Lethal Honor – Order of the Apocalypse is a challenging hack ‘n’ slash roguelite game, featuring eldritch creatures, fast-paced melee combat, and powerful abilities. Become part of a secret organization that investigates the paranormal and fights for the survival of humanity.

PREPARE TO DISCOVER THE TRUTH – Hand-drawn comic panels are seamlessly integrated into the gameplay to fully immerse you in a dark story full of mystery and intrigue. With every run and every death, you uncover more of the dangers of Wolf Island and the secrets that lie within.

EXPERIENCE THE MYSTERIES! – Discover the disturbing secrets of Lethal Honor in a story that happens during your runs through the biomes of the island. Alternate between Lost Agents and Key Agents, who follow their own story, as you discover what is happening on the island.

INTENSE, FAST-PACED COMBAT… – Attacking relentlessly will only lead to your early demise. Find your own style by combining unique abilities, artifacts, and enchantments into powerful combinations. Fight difficult bosses and show your superiority. Unleash hell onto your enemies!

Welcome to Lethal Honor â€“ Order of the Apocalypse!

Game Features

  • Brutal and punishing hack ‘n’ slash roguelite gameplay.
  • Gritty, hand-drawn, dark age graphic novel art style combined with 3D scenarios.
  • Several different biomes and playable key characters with their own storyline, abilities, and playstyles.
  • Unveil a mature, dark, and complex story seamlessly integrated into procedurally generated runs.

The post Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

item.title: Updates Digest for October 10, 2025
item.dc:creator: FitGirl
item.description:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday. All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages. All Update Digests, sorted by date âž§âž§âž§

The post Updates Digest for October 10, 2025 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
item.content:encoded:

All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Bye.Sweet.Carole-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-bye.sweet.carole.iso (15,908,012,032 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.1
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus artbook
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 14.8 to 6/6.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-7 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 14.8 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Immerse yourself in a world where the warmth of hand-drawn animation meets a rich story steeped in horror. From Chris Darril (Remothered series), Bye Sweet Carole invites you on a haunting journey full of secrets.

Set in early 20th Century England, as the suffrage movement begins to reshape society, young Lana Benton searches for her missing friend, Carole Simmons. Her path leads her through Bunny Hall orphanage and on to the mysterious kingdom of Corolla, a place controlled by the sinister Mr. Kyn, the ruthless owl Velenia, and swarms of ravenous tar bunnies. Caught between two worlds, Lana must find a way to survive and uncover the dark truth behind Carole’s disappearance.

Game Features

  • A heartfelt love letter to the precious classic animated films of our childhood and the evergreen old school adventures of the 90s.
  • Explore the eerie corridors of Bunny Hall and the fantastical world of Corolla, each filled with secrets and dangers.
  • Meet a cast of memorable characters: from the kind Mr. Baesie to the ominous owl Velenia and the menacing Mr. Kyn.
  • Investigate through puzzle solving, sneaking around deathly enemies, and overcoming platforming challenges.
  • Transform into a rabbit and use your forms to escape the threats of Bunny Hall and Corolla.

The post Bye Sweet Carole – v1.0.1 + Bonus ArtBook appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on The.Legacy-TiNYiSO ISO release: tn-thelegacy.iso (10,075,377,664 bytes)
  • Game version: v0.4971
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 9.4 to 5.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 15.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
The Legacy is a cooperative survival game in the horror genre.

In 1990, a curse fell upon our hometown. Our grandfather – a local molfar and magician – according to a sinister tradition, once every 66 years, was supposed to sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forest forces. But he couldn’t do it. Instead, he sent me, my two brothers, and my sister to Kyiv to protect us from the curse. He saved our lives but doomed the city and its surroundings to death and destruction…

Years passed. We became adults and built our own lives, but the memory of Svetlograd tormented our hearts. During one family dinner, we made a decision: to return there and end the darkness forever, to free the city and give people the chance to live again. Each of us has unique skills, strengths, and weaknesses – together, we complement each other perfectly. Having gathered some equipment, we went there… to face our destiny.

Survival – In The Legacy, there is a detailed survival system. Your character needs food and water, while the cold autumn climate of the Carpathian Mountains forces you to build fires, move around to stay warm, or find shelter at night. Your stamina depends on which character you’ve chosen and how full your backpack is. A bottle of energy drink can help you temporarily avoid stamina problems. When you run out of food and there’s no gas station or other source nearby, you can catch and cook a carp or hunt a wild animal to roast its meat over a fire, in an oven, or in a cauldron. Don’t forget about mushrooms and apples either.

Potions, Magic and Mysticism – Svetlograd is not just a city, and the nearby settlements are not simple villages. Many local legends tell of mysticism, dark and light magic, and mythical beings – meaning that the people here are far from ordinary. In The Legacy, you’ll find recipes for magic potions, information about dark entities and how to fight them, and ancient rituals. Collect herbs, mushrooms, and other ingredients. Learn the local mythology and fight evil either with guns and bullets or through rituals and potions.

Large Open World and Diverse Locations – The game features a large open world to explore while completing quests and struggling to survive. While exploring, you’ll find notes from local residents telling mystical stories about Svetlograd and its surroundings. Each time you start a new game, all game items – such as food, weapons, ammo, book pages, enemies, plants, mushrooms, and animals – appear in random places. This ensures that every playthrough feels truly new and unpredictable.

Construction, Resource Gathering and Crafting – With tools like an axe or a knife, you can gather resources. If you don’t have tools, try breaking sticks with your bare hands – but be careful, as you can easily cut yourself and will need bandages. The materials you collect can be used to craft various items or to build your own house, base, or camp. In a team, construction goes faster: one player gathers resources, another builds, while the third lights a fire and cooks food – so after setting up camp, you can enjoy a meal and regain your strength before new adventures.

Game Features

  • Play solo or in teams of up to 4 players.
  • Encounter and fight against a variety of mythical creatures.
  • A large and dangerous open world.
  • Hunt animals and fish.
  • Each mythical creature has unique attacks and behaviors.
  • Level up unique badges.
  • Play across 100+ servers simultaneously, thanks to an advanced save system – with friends or strangers.
  • Voice and text chat support.
  • Choose a unique avatar from a wide list of available options.
  • Build your own base or camp from gathered materials.
  • Experience the mystical atmosphere of Western Ukraine and the abandoned city of Svetlograd.
  • Detailed survival mechanics – your character gets wet if you stay in the rain for too long and freezes faster until you warm up by the fire or dry off. Hunger, thirst, temperature, stamina, blood loss, infections, curses, brewing potions to heal or remove curses, and much more.
  • Numerous crafting recipes.
  • Collect ingredients and potion recipes, perform rituals to banish dark forces.
  • Go boating, fishing, hunting, cooking by the fire or in the oven, helping others, sharing resources, and exploring a vast world together.
  • Every new playthrough randomizes loot and enemies – creatures may appear differently; in one game there may be 3, in another 5.
  • Start the game with basic equipment and weak weapons, but through exploration, discover advanced weapons, encounter military NPCs with AI, or find secret bunkers containing rare gear – but be careful… inside the bunker….

The post The Legacy – v0.4971 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • Installation takes 1-2 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 6.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
A spooky adventure where Vasilisa’s journey and service to Baba Yaga consist of a series of mini-games with a variety of gameplay mechanics.

You will go on a journey with Vasilisa to the land of the dead to obtain the power of fire, which only Baba Yaga can give. Vasilisa already has a magical helper â€” a doll given by her mother. But this is not enough to deal with the evil stepmother. It is necessary to pass the tests of the mistress of the forbidden forest and prove to her that Vasilisa is worthy to receive the power not only from her mother, but the mother of all mothers â€” Baba Yaga.

Game Features

  • Ð¡ombat missions: fight petty evil spirits; defeat the lord of the river Vodyanoy, lord of the swamp Bolotnik and lord of the forest Leshy (defeat the lords of the river, swamp and forest: Vodyanoy, Bolotnik and Leshy); prevail against the cruel stepmother.
  • Household chores: wash a mountain of dishes; do a pile of laundry; tidy up Baba Yaga’s hut; prepare the dough and bake some pirogi.
  • Tasks to test attentiveness: escape the fog; successfully leave the forest; do not get lost in the algae.
  • Tasks to test dexterity: sneak past a sleeping Vodyanoy without being caught; creep quietly past Bolotnik without being found; escape detection by Leshy; flee From Baba Yaga.
  • The game is based on unadapted versions of fairytales and folktales with elements of what is perceived in modern culture as horror.
  • The narrator reads the tale in a South Russian dialect. The story is told in the same manner as in Russian villages.
  • The soundtrack is an original piece based on folk songs from the central and southern parts of Russia.
  • The built-in encyclopaedia of folk tale characters, demonic creatures, household items, customs and rituals was compiled with the help of a consulting folklorist.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous Vasilisa repack.

The post Vasilisa and Baba Yaga: Digital Deluxe Edition, v1.5.7 + Bonus Content appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
